description: In Andes folklore, the pishtakus are gruesome corpse devourers, but they don’t disdain a banquet composed of the living. Cruel Judge Montenegro, a big landowner who lords it over a corrupt army division that takes orders from him, plans to use them against the rebel peasants of Huasimayo. The village elder, Don Santiago, was years before a childhood friend of the long-lived dampyr Harlan Draka, and so he summons Harlan to come to his help. Then Harlan, Tesla and Kurjak organize the campesinos’ resistance movement against their terrifying adversaries.
name: I massacratori delle Ande

description: Does the legendary temple of Eridano really exist? And what has become of the mummy that disappeared years ago from the Egyptian Museum in Turin? Upon their arrival in the Piedmontese city to investigate the death of a few prostitutes who bled to death, Harlan, Kurjak and Tesla make the acquaintance of Bastet, the stunningly attractive and absolutely lethal cat-goddess…
name: La Dea Egizia

description: Stuart is a troubled kid, hated by the inhabitants of his rural community, Shieldaig, on the shores of Loch Torridon in the Scottish Highlands. Maud Nightingale, a psychologist who’s been summoned for help by her friend Florence, Stuart’s aunt, in her turn seeks help from Harlan. Our dampyr used to be a problem child himself and maybe he’ll have some idea on how to deal with Stuart… There’s also another subtle link between the two: Harlan had a most unusual father, a Master of the Night, while Stuart has disowned his human father, who died on the moors to save him, and believes himself to be the son of a supernatural creature, a Shee. How much truth is there in the local legends? Who had Helen, Stuart’s mother, rashly promised herself to, during her lonely wanderings on the wild slopes of the Highlands?
name: Il mistero di Loch Torridon

description: The abstract and “living” paintings by an artist who’s mysteriously gone missing give access to a parallel reality… His daughter, who has the psychokinetic power of setting fires with her thought powers, is being hounded down by non human killers… Only the clairvoyant Ann Jurging, helped by the trio composed of the heroes Harlan, Tesla and Kurjak, will be able to solve the horrifying puzzle and avert the chaos of the “Day of the Phoenix”!
name: Il giorno della fenice

description: A dark, ill-omened and half-forgotten mystery is linked to the Kirby family’s ancestral Irish mansion that dates back to bygone times: a girl buried alive, a curse or whatever?… In our own time, Roland, the last scion of the family, works as a low-cost horror movie director, with a penchant for the vampire motif … His troupe chooses the deserted castle of Monforte da Estrela as the ideal location for the set, situated as it is in a wilderness region of Portugal. But unbeknowns to the English film-makers, even Monforte doesn’t have a lilywhite reputation. And it’s hardly a coincidence that two professional vampire hunters are also making their way to the eerie ruins. Harlan Draka and Emil Kurjak…
name: Lo sposo della vampira

description: What did the followers of an ancient gnostic sect hide in the statue kept in a Venice Church? Judas’s thirtieth piece of silver? A magic formula? Or a diabolical talisman capable of throwing open the doors to hell? And why does Veniero Zen, a gentleman robber, transform himself into a ruthless murderer for the beautiful eyes of mysterious Nada Mayley? Up and down the intricate maze of canals and quaint little squares of Venice, Harlan will find himself having to confront two of his most “infernal” foes. Only an ancient sword can save him – provided, that is, that he can return it, through time and space, to its original owner, a deceased samurai…And this is just the beginning of a saga beyond the bounds of imagination…
name: La spada senza tempo

description: Kenshin Is a Yakuza killer, one of the most expert and lethal of them all. But in his dreams he reminisces about other existences… Who is Kenshin really? A legendary sixteenth-century samurai? A mysterious painter of geisha portraits, who lived in the eighteenth century? Or a nineteenth-century author of kwaidan, i.e. of ghost stories? All of these "incarnations" of Kenshin were obsessed by a beautiful woman who went by the name of Yumi… a specter, a demoness or a woman warrior belonging to the curse-ridden clan of the Tairas, that became extinct one thousand years ago? When Harlan saves his life during warfare that has broken out between Mafia gangs, and gives him back the ancient sword of the samurai Ishiyama Saemon, the pair get enmeshed in a tumultuous string of horrors and magic, which lead them from a sinister temple infected by spirits to a lost world where the traditions, warriors and monsters of Japan of centuries past still live on…
name: Kwaidan

description: Another episode of the adventure in the land of the Rising Sun! After managing to get into the "castle of the thousand suns" to rescue beautiful Yumi, Harlan and the yakuza Kenshin have to face legions of samurais and hordes of ghoulish monsters headed by diabolical Sojobo, the goblin of the mountains! But perhaps a magic katana is not sufficient to sever the bonds of an ancient spell…
name: Il castello dei mille soli

description: Alessandra is about to give birth to her son, but she still feels persecuted by obscure and threatening presences. Someone, though, is watching over her from faraway Morocco… Mulawa, the blind soothsayer whose adopted grandson is the little demon Khaled, is an unrelenting opponent of Nazikian, the lord of the Black Dimension. Alessandra flies to Marrakech, only to find out that Mulawa has been abducted by a fierce gang of wrongdoers and no-goods. Luckily help is on hand in the form of Harlan, Kurjak and Tesla, Their pistols work perfectly against the Moroccan gangsters, but they are powerless against Nazikian the Obscure, the real father of Alessandra’s little boy... But who is the baby going to be like: its father or its mother?
name: Nazikian l’oscuro

description: Who is the mysterious black knight that prowls around the roads of Nicaragua at night? Can the legendary cruel colonel Arrechavala possibly have come back from the dead? The answer lies in the magical ability of Naklili, a young shaman of the Miskitos tribe, to forge traditional masks that imprison the spirits. And Harlan will have to measure his skill against a spectral and virtually invincible adversary…
name: Il Signore delle maschere

description: Who is Demian? A legend, that lives on the lips of storytellers in the disreputable bars down by the port? A criminal? This is the question that Pierre Rivac, a successful writer who’s recently come back to Marseilles after years in voluntary exile, sets about trying to answer. Little by little, his search leads him to discover a story that no-one had ever told. A story of love, hatred and violence, accompanied by the tune of an song from bygone times. And by the sound of the light swell of the sea…
name: Il ricordo e la vendetta

description:

  • Chapter 06: "Dark. World."
  • Chapter 07: "Sweet. Scent."
  • Chapter 08: "Solid. Determination."
  • Chapter 09: "Black. Vision."
  • Chapter 10: "White. Vision."

  • Chapter 13: "Screams. Smiles."
  • Chapter 14: "Bitter. Destruction."
  • "[V.V.V.] Drama CD Recording Report"
name: Vol. 3

description: The planet had died once before... On the day of Despaira, a god appeared in the sky and saved the world. His name was King Shishioh. But now with the throne of the king empty, a vicious battle between two brothers is unfolding. Who will ascend the throne?
name: Vol. 1

description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 23: "Master and Student. Endings."
  • Chapter 24: "Will to Fight. True Intentions."
  • Chapter 25: "Red. Mimicry."
  • Chapter 26: "Black. Mission."
  • Chapter 27: "Sisters. Pair."
  • Extra: "Bitter. Misconceptions."
name: Vol. 6

description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 28: "Grief. Excuses."
  • Chapter 29: "Distant. Night Scenery."
  • Chapter 30: "Celebrations. Curses."
  • Chapter 31: "Writings. Determination."
  • Chapter 32: "One Another. Salvation."
name: Vol. 7

description: Asaka is a dedicated wedding planner who’ll do anything to guarantee his clients’ happiness. Sadly, his own love life has all but vanished thanks to his ridiculous work schedule! But when Asaka’s first patron resurfaces, the precious spark of true love may finally fly for him. Can he plan the perfect affair…or will it just have to happen by chance?
name: Vol. 1
